content: stay warm in style with this beautiful cowl designed by stitch ambassador tamara kelly from moogly worked in a mobius loop this pattern will have you practicing front and back posts decreases and foundation double crochets this project is made in the delightfully fuzzy texture of red heart super saver brushed a soft and heathery yarn that you won t want to put down wear it around your shoulders or as a hood on especially chilly days - this versatile accessory can be styled in multiple ways to keep you warm right and left-handed video tutorials are available at https //www mooglyblog com/rh-into-the-woods-mobius/
